author: pestilence2960
content:
No real idea where I would be able to ask this, but I imagine someone has experience here -- Any thoughts as to why using Metamask against my own geth node would be so slow? It takes 10 - 20 seconds to calculate gas fees for any contract interaction; curious if I'm doing something wrong.

It is a 'light' node, if that makes a difference, but still seems egregious even for that.
(And of course, if there's a better place to ask this among highly technical people that have done this before, please do let me know!)

author: protolambda
content: <@!208767459589619712> there is a geth discord: https://discord.gg/vGqagtgjsP
